data.title: Blogging Mastermind (Group Consulting)
data.meta_description: Blogging Masterminds are an invaluable way to get focus, grow, and make money with your blog. Click here to learn more about blogging masterminds with NDC!
data.text:
NOTE: If you are interested, please fill out this form.

What is a Blogging Mastermind?

A mastermind is a group of individuals, sharing some of the same goals, who come together to grow their businesses and their skill set.

Group consulting / coaching is a valuable experience for any blogger and business owner – I am in multiple masterminds, including one for blogging, one for entrepreneurs, and one for consultants. I have a business consultant of my own and am forever grateful that she suggested I seek out masterminds – they have helped me grow my businesses faster and with clearer focus than I ever thought possible!

What are the Benefits of Joining a Blogging Mastermind?

it offers a supportive and safe place to explore new ideas and bounce those ideas off of people who want you to succeed

relationship building with like-minded, though not niche-specific, fellow entrepreneurs

it offers some one-on-one consulting services at a fraction of the cost

How are Masterminds Structured and What Will We Do?

Over the course of 6 weeks, you will grow as a blogger and entrepreneur, working to accomplish your goals and having an entire team as your support system. The basics of my blogging mastermind program are:

a one-on-one session with me so that we can discuss your goals, your obstacles, and your skill set

6 weeks of targeted live video chat and recorded sessions via Zoom (between 60 and 90 minutes each)

information, resource, and task sheets on discussion topics so you take expertise with you long after the mastermind is complete

some of the topics include:

growth and traffic strategies for your site

SEO basics and SEM strategies

website design and function

email list and opt-in building

working with brands directly, focusing on pitching and management

options to monetize websites that go far beyond the ‘basics’

How Much Does a Blogging Mastermind Cost?

There are two sizes for our intensive weekly sessions: groups of 4 or 6. A 4-person mastermind is $499 and a 6 person mastermind session is $350. Investment plans are available.
